about:
Hey there! 👋 I'm a seasoned Software Development Engineer with over 2 years of experience in cloud tech: think Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD.
 When I'm not optimizing microservices and building cool stuff, you might find me on the basketball court sinking baskets or defying gravity with a backflip! 🏀🔄

Top achievements? Made it to the top 33 teams in a national Ideathon, filed 3 patents on COVID-19 stuff, and aced SIH Hackathon and World IoT Hackathon. Always up for a challenge and hungry for more tech know-how! 🚀💻
